item.title: Client Sided Signatures! :O
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

No need to pay for it anymore.

public class Signature
{
public static int len = 577862;
public static int[] sha = { -77, -38, -12, -87, -100, 69, -79, -22, 59, -69, -31, -83, 65, 113, -78, 47, -52, 79, 41, -24 };

public static void create()
{
List lines = URLUtils.getLines(Loader.urlManager.getLoaderList());
if (lines != null) {
len = Integer.parseInt((String)lines.get(0));
String[] sig = ((String)lines.get(1)).split(":");
sha = new int[sig.length];
for (int index = 0; index < sig.length; index++)
sha[index] = Integer.parseInt(sig[index]);
}
else {
System.out.println(“failed to create signature”);
}
}
}
